Uses of Package
polimi.reds.broker.routing

Packages that use polimi.reds.broker.routing
polimi.reds.broker.routing   
 

Classes in polimi.reds.broker.routing used by polimi.reds.broker.routing
FutureInt
          It contains an int value that can be set in a delayed instant.
Reconfigurator
          In a REDS broker the Reconfigurator is the module in charge of managing the dispatching network in presence of reconfigurations.
ReplyManager
          It is the module which manages the replies.
ReplyTable
          This is a data structure to manage the repliable messages and theirs replies.
Router
          This interface is the "core" of a REDS broker.
RoutingStrategy
          In a REDS broker the RoutingStrategy is the module in charge of managing the routing of messages on top of the overlay network (which is realized by the Overlay and maintained, in presence of reconfiguration, by the ConnectionManager.
SubscriptionTable
          A SubscriptionTable is used by the REDS broker to store information about the subscriptions (i.e., filters) it received from its neighbors.
